properties.title: Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus

section.name: Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus
section.p: This project provides extra Folder Context Menu items such as 'Copy folder...' and 'Move folder...' for Hippo CMS 7 with extendable base implementations for developers.

subsection.name: Demo Application with Hippo CMS 7.9.x
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/folderctxmenus/folderctxmenus-demo/trunk folderctxmenus-demo-TRUNK $ cd folderctxmenus-demo-TRUNK $ mvn clean verify $ mvn -P cargo.run
